CustomField.description: Reward depending on class and place
CustomField.formula: CASE(Racer_Qualification_Status__c, 'Trainee', '1place 500$, 2 place 200$, 3place 50$', 'Associate', '1place 1500$, 2 place 700$, 3place 300$', 'F1 Racer', '1place 5000$, 2 place 3000$, 3place 1000$','Not defined')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reward depending on class and place
CustomField.label: Win bonus amount
